It manages server-side logic, database interactions, authentication, and API endpoints to ensure a robust and scalable backend infrastructure.
It focuses on creating secure, efficient, and maintainable code that supports the overall functionality of the application.
It ensures seamless communication between the frontend and backend, optimizing performance and reliability for end-users.
It implements best practices for data storage, retrieval, and security, adhering to industry standards and compliance requirements.
It uses frameworks and technologies such as Node.js, Express, Django, Ruby on Rails, or others depending on the project requirements.
It uses claudle sonnet 4.5 model for backend code generation.
